creditline: Gift of Richard and Roberta Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Ground is predominantly red with narrow green and yellow stripes near outer edges; approximately 20" sections on each end are patterned with birds, chevrons, triangles and diamonds; large multi-colored pompoms at one end.
dimension: 391 1/2 x 2 in. (994.41 x 5.1 cm) (with pompom 395 1/2 inches)
medium: Cotton, silk, synthetic; supplementary weft patterning
title: Hairtie (cinta)
